role: Scale partnerships into an enterprise ecosystem across carriers, vendors, and developers.
goals: Scale partner programs to support enterprise carriers and restoration vendors.
Align technical, legal, and commercial structures for sustainable partnerships.
tasks: Negotiate and close enterprise and vendor pilots aligned with platform capabilities.
Launch a partner/developer program with clear onboarding, benefits, and obligations.
Work with Product and Finance on sustainable commercial models (revenue share, usage tiers).
Gather structured feedback from partners to inform roadmap and technical priorities.
deliverables: Short domain-specific strategy/roadmap doc for this phase.
Updated documentation for this role’s systems and workflows.
One or more implemented improvements aligned with the phase goals.
Partner pipeline overview and status by category.
success_metrics: Clear before/after improvement in reliability, clarity, or value in this domain.
Stakeholders understand and can use the new workflows or capabilities.
This role’s area is ready for the next phase’s increased scope and complexity.
Meaningful increase in partner-sourced value (traffic, data, or revenue).
